root.name: Pocket Tennis
root.description: Overview Pocket Tennis is a tennis game created for the Neo Geo Pocket. Pocket Tennis is in the Pocket sports Series. Pocket Tennis supports the Link Cable for multiplayer. Pocket Tennis features eight different playable characters. Modes Pocket Tennis features three modes: Exhibition - Play a single match against a CPU opponent or with a friend via the Link Cable.Tournament - Play through a series of CPU opponents in order. Record - You can view both tournament record and trophies earned.
